document_data.mainbody:
anborim Street was a corduroy-log paved street in the upper side of the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.Over the years Sanborim Street has been mislabeled on maps twice. On Map05 of the City System accessory, it was labeled as Sanborn Street, and on the city map included in Waterdeep Dragon Heist it was mislabeled as Sandorim Street.
This street emerged southeast from Trollkill Street, then curved and continued down southwest until terminating at Phastal Street.
